translations.translation: And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents
and sent down abundant water from the clouds
and sent down heavy rains from the clouds
And then sent down hard rain from the water bearing clouds.
And We have sent down from the Mu`sirat water Thajjaj.
And We send down from the clouds water pouring forth abundantly,
and have sent down out of the rainclouds water cascading
And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water,
>From the rain clouds We send waters pouring down in abundance,
And We have sent down from the rain-clouds water plenteous.
and send down water pouring from the rain-clouds,
And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance,
And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water.
and have sent down from the clouds, pouring rain
And brought down from the clouds pouring water?
And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
[78:14] and sent down from the rain-clouds (mu‘sirāt), the clouds due to give rain (similar to [the term] mu‘sir, which denotes a girl nearing menstruation) cascading water?, pouring forth,
(And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant Water,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجاً } معناه من السَّماءِ
 ويقال: من الرِّيحِ
 ويقال: مِنَ السَّحابِ
 والثَّجاجُ: المُنصبُّ
